translation.en: What's up, fellas?
Where were you? I stopped by to give you a lift.
Had things to do. How's the party?
translation.it: Avevo da fare. Com'è la festa?

translation.en: Don't know. Just got here.
translation.it: Avevo da fare. Com'è la festa? Non lo so, arrivo adesso.

translation.en: Well, hell, boys...
...let's drop in.
Oh, shit, yeah.
Come on, Caleb. It's not like it's gonna kill us...
translation.it: Avanti, Caleb. Non ci ucciderà mica...

translation.en: ...yet.
So give me the scoop. Who's here?
The first thing you have to know is that Aaron Abbot is a prick.
translation.it: La prima cosa da sapere è che Aaron Abbot è uno stronzo.

translation.en: -Treats girls like dirt. -Okay.
translation.it: - Tratta le ragazze da schifo. - Va bene.

translation.en: -Who's that? -The new guy.
He's looking over here.
Don't know much about him, but I intend to find out.
translation.it: Non so molto di lui, ma approfondirò.

translation.en: He's cute.
-Hey, who's that chick with Kate? -Sarah something.
translation.it: Ehi, chi è la tipa con Kate? Sarah qualcosa.

translation.en: She transferred in from a Boston public.
translation.it: Era in una scuola pubblica a Boston.

translation.en: She's kind of hot.
-Yo, Caleb. -They're here.
-Who are they? -The Sons of Ipswich.
translation.it: Chi sono? I Figli di Ipswich.

translation.en: -Hey, Kate. -Caleb.
-Hi. You're late. -I had a thing with the family.
translation.it: - Ciao. Sei in ritardo. - Questioni di famiglia.

translation.en: -Who's this? -My new roommate.
translation.it: - Lei chi è? - La mia nuova coinquilina.

translation.en: Sarah, this is Pogue Parry, Tyler Simms...
translation.it: Sarah, loro sono Pogue Parry, Tyler Simms...

translation.en: -...Reid-- -Garwin. Reid Garwin.
translation.it: Sarah, loro sono Pogue Parry, Tyler Simms... - Reid. - Garwin. Reid Garwin.

translation.en: -Good evening. -Good evening.
You know, Sarah's my grandmother's name.
translation.it: Sai, Sara è il nome di mia nonna.

translation.en: -You kind of remind me of her. -Caleb Danvers.
translation.it: - Un po' me la ricordi. - Caleb Danvers.

translation.en: And you don't bring my grandmother to mind in any way.
translation.it: E non mi ricordi neanche lontanamente mia nonna.

translation.en: Good. Sarah.
-Hey, Caleb. -Kira.
How was your summer?
-I'm Kira. -Sarah.
Oh, right. From the Boston public.
translation.it: Oh, sì. Dalla scuola pubblica di Boston.

translation.en: Tell me, how does one go about getting into Spenser from a public?
translation.it: Dimmi, come si fa a passare da una pubblica alla Spenser?

translation.en: -Why don't you give it a rest, Kira? -Why don't you give it a rest?
translation.it: Perché non la pianti, Kira? Perché non la pianti tu?

translation.en: -I don't want any trouble, Aaron. -I'm sure you don't.
translation.it: - Non voglio guai, Aaron. - Certo che no.

translation.en: You posers make me wanna puke.
-Is that right? -Hey, let it go.
I think you owe Kira an apology.
translation.it: Credo che debba scusarti con Kira.

translation.en: Actually, I think Kira owes Sarah the apology.
translation.it: Veramente, Kira dovrebbe scusarsi con Sarah.

translation.en: You were being kind of bitchy.
Disgusting! You idiot!
Guys, Dylan just called.
He said he saw three cop cars headed this way on Old Dell Road.
translation.it: Ha visto tre volanti sulla Old Dell Road dirette qui.

translation.en: -Hey, let's roll! -Let's go.
-Let's go, boys. -Let's go!
-You need a ride? -No, Sarah drove us out here.
translation.it: - Volete un passaggio? - No, siamo con l'auto di Sarah.

translation.en: -Will I see you back at the dorms? -It's getting late. I'm just gonna crash.
translation.it: - Ci vediamo in dormitorio? - È tardi, mi sa che crollerò.

translation.en: Call me in the morning?
-I could use a lift. -No problem.
translation.it: - Mi servirebbe un passaggio. - Nessun problema.

translation.en: -Hey, nice going back there. Caleb. -Chase.
translation.it: - Ehi, bella mossa prima. Caleb. - Chase.

translation.en: Thought that guy and I were about to go at it.
translation.it: Pensavo che ce le saremmo date.

translation.en: His friend's puking sure came at an opportune time.
translation.it: Il suo amico ha vomitato al momento giusto.

translation.en: Didn't it, though?
Yeah, yeah, yeah. Hop in my truck.
-Good night. -I got room. Who needs a ride?
Hey, guys, let's go. We gotta go before the cops come.
translation.it: Forza, andiamo. Prima che arrivino gli sbirri.

translation.en: Sarah wants you, man.
-That's bullshit. -Oh, now. Don't be jealous, Reid.
translation.it: - Stronzate. - Oh, su. Non fare il geloso, Reid.

translation.en: -My car won't start! -Hop in with us.
translation.it: - La macchina non parte! - Venite con noi.

translation.en: -I can't just leave it here! -I could fix it for you.
translation.it: - Non posso lasciarla qui! - Te la riparo io.

translation.en: -Reid, don't. -It's not over yet, boys.
translation.it: - Reid, non farlo. - Non è finita, ragazzi.

translation.en: Let it go. It's his life, man.
translation.it: Lascia stare. La vita è sua.

translation.en: Try it again.
Thank you!
-Gotta bolt. Move over. -It's my car.
translation.it: - Scappiamo. Spostati. - È la mia macchina.

translation.en: Move over, baby boy. Now!
No sweat.
We gotta pull over.
You wanna stop? That'll impress Harvard.
All right, what the hell? Let's lose them.
Cut across Marblehead. We might as well have some fun.
Lose them!
-Step on it. Go! -Stupid kids.
All right, guys, you ready?
Come on, Caleb. It's gonna take all of us.
Hey, they don't know. Hit the horn. Hit the horn!
translation.it: Ehi, non lo sanno. Suona il clacson. Suona!

translation.en: -Holy shit, they're going over. -Harry Potter can kiss my ass!
translation.it: Porca troia, cadranno. Harry Potter può baciarmi il culo!

translation.en: Stop the car! Stop the car!
Son of a bitch.
We must be the last ones in.
Well, this is us.
-Just a sec. -Oh, my God!
translation.it: - Ferma un attimo. - Oh, mio Dio!

translation.en: -Hate those things. -And they're all over the place here.
translation.it: - Odio quei cosi. - E questo posto ne è pieno.

translation.en: Thank you.
See? Chivalry's not dead after all.
No, it just transferred in.
We're gonna go into town tomorrow for some things.
-Do you need to pick up any stuff? -Sure.
I'm in 311. Call me.
Okay.
-He's hot, huh? -Listen to you.
-Thanks for the ride. -All right. Take it easy.
-I'll see you later, man. -Call me in the morning.
translation.it: - Ci si vede, amico. - Chiamami domattina.

translation.en: You're home early.
It's after midnight, Mother. What are you still doing up?
translation.it: È mezzanotte passata, mamma. Che fai in piedi?

translation.en: Thinking about my baby turning 18 this week.
translation.it: Penso al mio bambino che questa settimana fa 18 anni.

translation.en: God. You look so much like him in this light.
translation.it: Oddio. Gli assomigli tanto con questa luce.

translation.en: You know, he was a year younger than you when we met.
translation.it: Sai, aveva un anno in meno di te quando l'ho conosciuto.

translation.en: Did I ever tell you that?
Yeah. You've told me.
Now, let's get you up to bed.
So handsome.
He was the most beautiful man I'd ever seen.
translation.it: L'uomo più bello che avessi mai visto.

translation.en: I'm so afraid I'll lose you like I did him.
translation.it: Ho tanta paura di perderti come ho perso lui.

translation.en: How many times do I need to tell you that I'm not him?
translation.it: Per l'ennesima volta, io non sono lui.

translation.en: That's the same thing he said about his father.
translation.it: È quello che diceva lui di suo padre.

translation.en: You know, these powers...
...that you and your friends developed when you were 13...
translation.it: ...che tu e i tuoi amici avete sviluppato a 13 anni...

translation.en: ...are nothing compared with what you'll get when you ascend.
translation.it: ...non sono nulla rispetto a quelli che otterrete all'ascensione.

translation.en: They are 1000 times stronger.
They are so seductive.
You'll suddenly think...
...the world is yours for the taking.
And then you really start to use...
translation.it: E allora inizierete a usarli davvero...

translation.en: ...and use...
...aging each time.
Taking bits of your life...
-...until there is nothing left. -I won't.
translation.it: - ...finché non resterà più nulla. - Non lo farò.

translation.en: That's what he said.
I can't lose you both.
I won't survive it this time.
I won't.
So why do you call them "the Sons of Ipswich"?
translation.it: Ma perché li chiami "i Figli di Ipswich"?

translation.en: What are they? Like, a boy band?
translation.it: Cosa sono? Una specie di boy band?

translation.en: You know what? I like you. You're funny.
translation.it: Sai che mi piaci? Sei simpatica.

translation.en: Not like all the other stuck-up bitches.
translation.it: Non sei come quelle stronze snob.

translation.en: No. They're supposedly descendants of five families...
...that settled the Ipswich Colony in the 1600s.
translation.it: ...che fondarono la Colonia di Ipswich nel 1600.

translation.en: Old money.
Caleb and Reid were both checking you out tonight.
translation.it: Caleb e Reid ti mangiavano con gli occhi.

translation.en: If it were me, I'd go for Caleb.
Why?
He's just one of those majorly good guys.
Well, how do you mean?
He could stay here and party with the rest of us...
...but he stays at home to take care of his mom.
translation.it: ...invece sta a casa a occuparsi della madre.

translation.en: What's wrong with her?
After Caleb's dad died, she became a bit of an alcoholic.
translation.it: Da quando il padre di Caleb è morto, beve.

translation.en: So is he seeing anyone?
So we are interested.
-So who's the fifth? -Fifth what?
translation.it: - E chi è il quinto? - Il quinto cosa?

translation.en: Well, you said five families.
translation.it: Le famiglie sono cinque. E il quinto?

translation.en: They say the fifth was killed during the witch-hunt.
translation.it: Pare che sia morto nella caccia alle streghe.

translation.en: -What? -Cool, huh?
Or creepy.
Couldn't see nothing but their taillights in the damn fog.
translation.it: Con la nebbia si vedevano solo i fari posteriori.

translation.en: But I swear to God...
...it sure seemed like they went right off the damn cliffs.
What you were probably looking at...
...were the aircraft warning lights on the Marblehead lighthouse.
translation.it: ...le luci di segnalazione del faro di Marblehead.

translation.en: Captain, we have a suspect vehicle with occupant back near the Dells.
translation.it: Capitano, abbiamo un veicolo sospetto con occupante vicino ai Dells.

translation.en: Respond and advise.
We tried to wake him, but he's passed out cold.
translation.it: Abbiamo provato a svegliarlo, ma è fuori gioco.

translation.en: Doors are all locked.
Go ahead and call it in. We're gonna need a tow.
translation.it: Chiamate la centrale per un rimorchio.

translation.en: Hey, kid!
Open up!
Give me your flashlight.
Break out the rear window.
Son.
Somebody there?
Hello?
Hello?
-Oh, my God. -Didn't mean to scare you.
translation.it: - Oh, mio Dio. - Non volevo spaventarti.

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -Just got back.
Sorry. I'm just a little freaked out.
translation.it: Scusa, sono solo un po' spaventata.

translation.en: It felt like someone was watching me in the showers.
translation.it: Scusa, sono solo un po' spaventata. Mi sentivo osservata nella doccia.

translation.en: Let's take a look, shall we?
It's okay.
Don't see anyone.
-I'll catch you later, then. -Yeah, see you.
translation.it: - A dopo, allora. - Sì, ci vediamo.

translation.en: -What makes you think it was Reid? -It's always him.
translation.it: - Perché pensi che sia stato Reid? - È sempre lui.

translation.en: I've never felt it when one of us used The Power. Have you?
translation.it: Stavolta ho percepito qualcuno usare il Potere. Tu?

translation.en: No. I don't know, maybe it's because you're so close to ascending.
translation.it: No. Forse ti succede perché sei vicino all'ascensione.

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe.
I'm telling you, it was strong enough to wake me out of a dead sleep.
translation.it: Era così forte da svegliarmi da un sonno profondo.

translation.en: He's only using his powers to piss you off...
translation.it: Sta usando i poteri per farti incazzare...

translation.en: ...because he's jealous you're ascending first, man.
I'm telling you, just-- Jesus!
What's going on, Caleb? Pick up.
Caleb, pick up the phone, man.
Caleb, what's going on?
I just saw a darkling.
It was in the form of that dead kid they found at the Dells.
translation.it: Aveva la forma del ragazzo trovato ai Dells.

translation.en: I saw his picture this morning in the newspaper.
translation.it: Ho visto la sua foto sul giornale di oggi.

translation.en: -But who'd send you a darkling? -I have no idea.
translation.it: - Ma chi ti manderebbe un oscuro? - Non ne ho idea.

translation.en: Something's wrong. I can feel it.
translation.it: C'è qualcosa che non va. Lo sento.

translation.en: We gotta talk to Reid tonight.
He'll probably be at Nicky's.
translation.it: Sarà da Nicky. Lo incontriamo lì.

translation.en: -We'll see him then. -Definitely.
translation.it: Sarà da Nicky. Lo incontriamo lì. Puoi contarci.

translation.en: -Here you go, Caleb. -Thanks.
Hey, Caleb.
-Oh, hey, Kate. What are you up to? -I'm just stocking up our room.
translation.it: - Oh, ehi, Kate. Che fai di bello? - Faccio scorte per la stanza.

translation.en: -Did you hear about the dead kid? -Yeah, I did.
translation.it: - Hai sentito del ragazzo trovato morto? - Sì.

translation.en: Did you know him?
No. No, he just transferred in.
translation.it: No. No, si era appena trasferito.

translation.en: Yeah, I heard he lived on Reid and Tyler's floor.
translation.it: Stava nel piano di Reid and Tyler.

translation.en: -Hi. -Hi there.
You scared me.
-Hey, man. -Hey.
I'm gonna see if Pogue wants to catch that new Brad Pitt flick this afternoon.
translation.it: Chiedo a Pogue se vuole vedere il nuovo film di Brad Pitt.

translation.en: -Who else wants to go? -I will.
I gotta run some errands for my mother.
translation.it: Devo fare delle commissioni per mia madre.

translation.en: I already saw it.
-Do you feel like running errands? -Sure.
I wish I'd brought my camera. This place is so beautiful.
translation.it: Non ho la macchina fotografica. Questo posto è stupendo.

translation.en: That's the old Putnam barn. What's left of it.
translation.it: Quello è il vecchio granaio di Putnam. Quel che ne resta.

translation.en: This whole place, for miles around, was the original Ipswich Colony.
translation.it: Tutta la zona qui intorno era l'antica Colonia di Ipswich.

translation.en: -So, what brought you to Spenser? -A scholarship.
translation.it: - Cosa ti porta alla Spenser? - Una borsa di studio.

translation.en: -But why Spenser? -I want to go to Harvard.
translation.it: - Ma perché la Spenser? - Voglio andare ad Harvard.

translation.en: -My father was class of '81. -That's so cool.
translation.it: - Mio padre si è laureato lì nell'81. - Fantastico.

translation.en: -Kate told me he passed away. -You and Kate talk about me?
translation.it: Kate mi ha detto che è morto. Tu e Kate parlate di me?

translation.en: Well, you know, just girl stuff.
It's our family's first colony house.
translation.it: Era la prima casa della mia famiglia.

translation.en: -Wait. Somebody lives here? -Just our caretaker, Gorman.
translation.it: - Aspetta, è abitata? - Solo dal nostro custode, Gorman.

translation.en: Gorman! It's me! It's okay!
translation.it: Gorman! Sono io! Va tutto bene!

translation.en: -He doesn't see that well anymore. -You think?
translation.it: - Non ci vede più molto bene. - Tu credi?

translation.en: -Who's with you? -Just a friend.
translation.it: - Chi c'è con te? - Solo un'amica.

translation.en: -I'll be right back, okay? -Okay.
translation.it: - Torno subito, va bene? - Va bene.

translation.en: -You should be more careful. -I know, Gorman.
translation.it: - Devi stare più attento. - Lo so, Gorman.

translation.en: -Is there anything else he needs? -No.
I'll see you next week, then.
-Okay? -Yeah. Yeah, I'm okay.
translation.it: - Tutto bene? - Sì. Sì, a posto.

translation.en: So you wanna shower or change first?
translation.it: Vuoi farti una doccia o cambiarti prima?

translation.en: -For what? -We're going to Nicky's.
What's Nicky's?
Hey. How are you?
Oh, hey, baby! You missed a great movie.
translation.it: Oh, ehi, tesoro! Ti sei perso un gran bel film.

translation.en: Yeah, I had to get my bike fixed.
That's cool. Chase hung out and kept me company.
translation.it: Non fa niente. C'era Chase con me.

translation.en: I'll just bet he did.
-What's up, man? -It's all good.
You want something to eat?
I'll just pick at whatever you're having.
translation.it: Scegli tu e mi dai un pezzo.

translation.en: Can I get a burger, fries and a Coke?
translation.it: Posso avere un hamburger con patatine e cola?

translation.en: -Corner pocket. -Great shot.
Well, well, well....
-How long you guys been here? -A bit.
translation.it: - Da quanto siete qui? - Da un po'.

translation.en: Just been playing Aaron and Bordy, and-- Would you look at that?
translation.it: Giocavamo con Aaron e Bordy, e... Guardate un po' lì?

translation.en: -Blue, cotton. -Pink, lace.
translation.it: - Blu, di cotone. - Rosa, di pizzo.

translation.en: Boys, that girl hasn't worn panties since she was 12.
translation.it: Ragazzi, quella non porta le mutandine da quando ha 12 anni.

translation.en: Yeah. Thanks, boys.
Keep the change.
Next time.
You guys are real tight, huh?
Families are real close. We kind of grew up together.
-We're kind of like brothers. -That must have been nice.
-The best two out of three. -Okay.
Hey, Chase. Mind if I get in a game?
translation.it: Ehi, Chase. Posso fare una partita?

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. Sure.
Reid and Tyler are here.
-Where? -Pool tables. With Aaron and the boys.
translation.it: - Dove? - Al biliardo. Con Aaron e i ragazzi.

translation.en: Great. That's trouble.
So Caleb tells me you guys are swimmers.
translation.it: Caleb mi diceva che siete nuotatori.

translation.en: Spenser's best. State finals twice.
translation.it: Due volte in finale con la Spenser.

translation.en: I swam for Hastings. I was their freestyle man.
translation.it: Io nuotavo per l'Hastings. Ero il loro campione di stile libero.

translation.en: You won't be here. That's Caleb's swim.
translation.it: Non qui. È la specialità di Caleb.

translation.en: -Okay, what just happened? -What?
We were sitting here together, having fun...
...and now we're watching them have fun.
That's what girls do. You know boys and their toys.
translation.it: Le ragazze fanno così. Giochi da maschi.

translation.en: -Give me a quarter. -Why?
Just give me a quarter. I'll show you what girls do.
translation.it: Tu dammela. Ti mostro cosa fanno le ragazze.

translation.en: Thank you.
Gentlemen, it was a pleasure.
What?
-Blow me! -Let's take it outside. Come on.
Hey, it's Reid and Tyler. Grab my jacket.
translation.it: Ehi, sono Reid e Tyler. Prendimi la giacca.

translation.en: -You guys need help? -Just stay with the girls.
translation.it: - Volete aiuto? - Stai con le ragazze.

translation.en: Get him, Reid!
Let's go. Bring it on, man.
He made the shot, dickhead. You bet him he couldn't and he did.
translation.it: Ha fatto centro, coglione. Hai scommesso di no e l'ha fatto.

translation.en: We ain't paying you shit, so if you don't like it--
translation.it: Non vi paghiamo un cazzo, e se non vi sta bene...

translation.en: What's the problem?
He bet me I couldn't make a combo shot, and I did.
translation.it: Pensava che non avrei fatto una combo, e invece sì.

translation.en: -Everyone just forget about it, okay? -Hey! Take it someplace else, ladies.
translation.it: - Lasciate perdere, va bene? - Ehi! Andate altrove, bambocci.

translation.en: -Now. -Whatever you say, Nicky.
translation.it: - Adesso. - Tutto quello che vuoi, Nicky.

translation.en: -What were you thinking? -We were just playing them.
translation.it: - Che ti salta in testa? - Li ho presi per il culo.

translation.en: Yeah, come on, Caleb. They were suckers for it.
Why don't you quit being such a pussy?
translation.it: La smetti di fare la femminuccia?

translation.en: I'm not finished with you yet.
Reid, stop.
What will it take for you to get it?
It's addictive, you moron!
You've seen what it can do if you abuse it.
translation.it: Hai visto cosa può fare se ne abusi.

translation.en: You want that? That's your business.
translation.it: È questo che vuoi? Affari tuoi.

translation.en: But if you use in the open, like you did tonight, you risk exposing us all.
translation.it: Ma se lo usi in pubblico, come stasera, ci metti tutti a rischio.

translation.en: And that I won't let happen.
-My power's greater than yours. -Not until you ascend.
translation.it: Il mio potere è più forte. Non finché non ascendi.

translation.en: All right, go for it, tough guy.
translation.it: Va bene, fai pure il duro.

translation.en: -Stop it! This is crazy. -It's for his own good!
translation.it: - Fermati! È una follia. - È per il suo bene!

translation.en: Keep using like you did tonight and last night...
translation.it: Se ne fai uso come stasera e ieri sera...

translation.en: ...you'll be as good as dead.
So I fixed her car. Big deal!
Don't play me, Reid! I'm talking later and you know it.
translation.it: Non prendermi per il culo! Parlo del dopo e lo sai.

translation.en: The hell I do!
I didn't use later.
translation.it: Non ne ho fatto uso dopo.

translation.en: It's not right using on each other, Caleb.
translation.it: È sbagliato usarli tra di noi.

translation.en: Tell it to Reid.
Reid's lying. It had to have been him.
translation.it: Reid mente. Dev'essere per forza lui.

translation.en: How do you know?
Because it wasn't you. Tyler doesn't have the balls to lie to me.
translation.it: Perché non sei stato tu. Tyler non ha le palle per mentirmi.

translation.en: -Hey. -Hey.
translation.it: Tyler non ha le palle per mentirmi. Ehi.

translation.en: -You okay? -Yeah.
-Yeah, I'm fine. -Let's go.
Yeah, let's get out of here.
Thanks again for a great day. I had fun.
translation.it: Grazie per la bella giornata. Mi sono divertita.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, me too.
Listen, I'm sorry about Gorman.
He's just not used to seeing me with anyone.
translation.it: È che non è abituato a vedermi con qualcuno.

translation.en: I think I'll survive.
Fact is, you're the only girl I've ever taken out there.
translation.it: Il fatto è che sei l'unica che abbia mai portato lì.

translation.en: -Really? -Yeah.
-And why is that? -I'm not sure just yet.
translation.it: Come mai? Non lo so ancora.

translation.en: -Good night. -Good night.
Kate, wake up! Kate, wake up!
Yeah.
I just saw the same darkling you saw last night. That dead kid at the Dells.
translation.it: Ho visto il tuo stesso oscuro. Il ragazzo morto dei Dells.

translation.en: What the hell is it?
I don't know. It's starting to freak me out.
translation.it: Non lo so. Comincia a spaventarmi.

translation.en: I'm telling you, someone's using powers...
...and I mean bigtime.
And I intend to find out who.
-Hey. -Hi.
Good morning.
Mr. Danvers...
...Provost Higgins requests the pleasure of your company after class.
translation.it: ...il preside Higgins le vorrebbe parlare dopo la lezione.

translation.en: We're going to study four American contemporary writers of fiction.
translation.it: Oggi studieremo quattro scrittori americani contemporanei.

translation.en: First is Cormac McCarthy, then Tim O'Brien...
translation.it: Il primo è Cormac McCarthy, il secondo Tim O'Brien...

translation.en: ...Kent Haruf, and last but not least...
translation.it: ...Kent Haruf, e ultimo ma non meno importante...

translation.en: -...Stephen King. -Yeah! Dreamcatcher was the shit!
translation.it: - ...Stephen King. - Sì! L'acchiappasogni è una bomba!

translation.en: Thank you, Mr. Garwin, but no. My choice is The Shining.
translation.it: Grazie, sig. Garwin, ma la mia scelta è Shining.

translation.en: This is not the kind of publicity this institution is interested in.
translation.it: Non è il tipo di pubblicità che quest'istituzione desidera.

translation.en: You wouldn't know anything about it, would you, Mr. Danvers?
translation.it: Lei non ne sa niente, vero, sig. Danvers?

translation.en: No, sir.
But you would know about a fight at a local bar last night.
translation.it: Ma saprà forse di una rissa in un bar ieri sera.

translation.en: -Sir, if I could-- -And if I'm correct...
translation.it: - Signore, se... - E se non erro...

translation.en: ...Chase Collins was with you?
Yes, sir.
Chase Collins comes to us with a brilliant academic record...
translation.it: Chase Collins viene qui con un curriculum eccezionale...

translation.en: ...and his family trust has made a generous endowment...
translation.it: ...e il suo fondo familiare ha fatto una donazione generosa...

translation.en: ...to this institution.
I want to make sure he has a positive experience at Spenser.
translation.it: Voglio assicurarmi che si trovi bene qui.

translation.en: -Do I make myself clear? -Yes, sir.
Good.
I understand you and Chase have already bonded...
translation.it: Mi sembra che lei e Chase abbiate già legato...

translation.en: ...and I would appreciate it if you would continue...
...to take him under your wing, make sure his stay here is a pleasant one.
translation.it: ...e vorrei che lei continuasse... ...a tenerlo sotto la sua ala, farlo sentire a suo agio qui.

translation.en: -And, Caleb. -Sir?
No more fights.
Yes, sir.
What is that?
Caleb's family history.
translation.it: La storia della famiglia di Caleb.

translation.en: Did you know that the witchcraft thing started here in Ipswich?
translation.it: Sai che la storia della stregoneria è nata a Ipswich?

translation.en: Every time I ask Pogue about it, he just tells me it's all nonsense.
translation.it: Ogni volta che chiedo a Pogue, mi dice che sono tutte assurdità.

translation.en: So, what did the provost want?
Someone told him about the fight at Nicky's.
translation.it: Qualcuno gli ha detto della rissa da Nicky.

translation.en: Feel like elaborating on that?
You got a piece of glass in your face. Hold on.
translation.it: Hai un pezzo di vetro sulla faccia. Aspetta.

translation.en: -Say my name! -Grow up, dude.
translation.it: - Ti piace, eh? - Vedi di crescere.

translation.en: What are you looking at, fag?
That thing between your legs.
translation.it: Quella cosa che hai tra le gambe.

translation.en: It's like a penis, only smaller.
translation.it: Sembra un pene, ma più piccolo.

translation.en: Hey, let him go, Aaron!
Don't be so sensitive, Aaron.
Size isn't everything.
My man.
Up for some foosball?
I have dinner with Sarah, but I think I can hang out for a while.
translation.it: Sono a cena con Sarah, ma penso di avere un po' di tempo.

translation.en: -What about you? -No, man. I'm cool.
translation.it: - E tu? - No, amico. Va bene così.

translation.en: You're being ridiculous! What is your problem?
-Chase is my problem. -What, are you jealous?
translation.it: - È Chase il problema. - Cosa, sei geloso?

translation.en: -I don't want you hanging around him. -Look, he is just a friend.
translation.it: - Non voglio che lo frequenti. - Ascolta, è solo un amico.

translation.en: Yeah, right. I'm sure he's interested in just being friends.
translation.it: Sì, come no. Vuole solo la tua amicizia.

translation.en: This is beyond idiotic.
Thanks for dinner.
-How about Saturday? -What about Saturday?
translation.it: - Che ne dici di sabato? - Cosa c'è sabato?

translation.en: -It's the Fall Fest. -Oh, Fall Fest.
translation.it: La festa d'autunno. Oh, la festa d'autunno.

translation.en: Just wondering if you wanted to go with me.
translation.it: Mi chiedevo se volessi andarci con me.

translation.en: And, also, it happens to be my birthday.
translation.it: E poi, è anche il mio compleanno.

translation.en: I don't know.
I'd love to go with you.
-I should go. -Yeah. Yeah, you should.
-No. I mean, back to the dorms. -Yeah, I know what you mean.
translation.it: - No. Voglio dire, in dormitorio. - Sì, so che vuoi dire.

translation.en: I'm really gonna go.
This is me leaving.
-Good night. -Good night.
Sleep tight.
I hate him when he's like this.
He's been jealous since the day we met. It drives me crazy.
translation.it: È stato geloso fin dal primo giorno. Mi dà sui nervi.

translation.en: You don't hate Pogue. You guys are perfect for each other.
translation.it: Non è vero che lo odi. Siete fatti l'uno per l'altra.

translation.en: Maybe not.
Maybe it's time to check out something new.
And maybe that's what Pogue's picking up on.
translation.it: E forse è questo che Pogue teme.

translation.en: -This is the eighth time he's called. -So talk to him.
translation.it: - È l'ottava volta che chiama. - Rispondi allora.

translation.en: No. Not until he stops being an idiot.
translation.it: Non se non smette di fare l'idiota.

translation.en: I'll bet Caleb's not the jealous type.
translation.it: Scommetto che Caleb non fa il geloso.

translation.en: Go for it!
Come on, man!
Come on, Pogue!
-He really is good. -He's the best.
translation.it: - È proprio bravo. - È il migliore.

translation.en: I hear you swim a mean freestyle.
translation.it: So che anche tu non sei male.

translation.en: -That's what they tell me. -Let's see what you got.
translation.it: - Così dicono. - Vediamo di che pasta sei fatto.

translation.en: Let's go!
Push off! Let's go!
You okay, man?
There you are. Had us going there for a second.
translation.it: Meno male. Ci hai fatto spaventare.

translation.en: Whacked your head pretty good.
Lucky for you, Chase was there to get you out...
translation.it: Per fortuna, Chase ti ha salvato...

translation.en: ...before you sucked up the pool.
translation.it: ...prima che ti bevessi tutta la piscina.

translation.en: He also whipped your ass.
translation.it: Ti ha anche fatto il culo.

translation.en: It became apparent that the view of civil liberties...
translation.it: L'idea che le libertà civili non avessero

translation.en: ...needing no special protection was not widely shared.
translation.it: ...bisogno di protezioni speciali non era molto condivisa.

translation.en: Come in. Thank you.
Twelve amendments were suggested, 10 eventually ratified.
Called the what, Ms. Snider?
-The Bill of Rights. -Right you are.
Arguably, the first being the most important. Read it for us, Mr. Simms.
translation.it: Il primo è forse il più importante. Legga a voce alta, sig. Simms.

translation.en: Mr. Collins, you're wanted in the provost's office.
translation.it: Sig. Collins, è richiesto nell'ufficio del preside.

translation.en: Mr. Simms.
"Congress shall make no law...
...respecting an establishment of religion...
translation.it: ...leggi per il riconoscimento di una religione...

translation.en: ...or prohibiting the free exercise thereof...
...or abridging the freedom of speech, or of the press...
translation.it: ...o che limitino la libertà di parola, o di stampa...

translation.en: ...or the right of the people peaceably to assemble...."
-Provost Higgins. You wanted to...? -Chase, come in.
You know one of our students lost his life...
translation.it: Sa della morte del nostro studente...

translation.en: ...a few nights back at the Dells.
Yes, I heard.
-Did you know him? -No, sir. Why?
His car was returned to his parents.
translation.it: L'auto è stata portata ai genitori.

translation.en: His mother was kind enough to send this back to us.
translation.it: La madre ce l'ha gentilmente spedita.

translation.en: -My student ID. I lost it that night. -It was in the back seat.
translation.it: La mia tessera studente. L'ho persa quella sera. Era sul sedile dietro.

translation.en: That's odd. I wonder how he got it.
-Thank you, sir. -You're welcome.
translation.it: - Grazie, signore. - Non c'è di che.

translation.en: I understand you've become close with Caleb and his friends.
translation.it: So che ha legato con Caleb e i suoi amici.

translation.en: Yeah. They're great guys, sir.
I agree. You couldn't have picked a better bunch.
translation.it: Concordo. Non poteva fare scelta migliore.

translation.en: I think so too.
-Am I gonna see you tonight? -I hope so.
Listen, I have something to do first. I'll give you a call later, okay?
translation.it: Senti, prima ho un impegno. Ti richiamo, va bene?

translation.en: -I'll be in my room. -Okay.
What'd she say about Kate? Why won't she call me back?
translation.it: Che ha detto di Kate? Perché non mi richiama?

translation.en: She's still pissed at you.
-Why are we doing this? -I saw the darkling again.
translation.it: - Ma che stiamo facendo? - Ho rivisto l'oscuro.

translation.en: Yeah, but why break into the admissions office?
Because I wanna know more about Chase Collins.
Look, I don't even like the guy.
translation.it: Ascolta... Non che mi stia simpatico, ma...

translation.en: Are you sure you're not just imagining this?
translation.it: ...non è che te lo sei immaginato?

translation.en: I'm telling you, his eyes were as black as night in the pool today.
translation.it: Senti, oggi in piscina aveva gli occhi neri come la notte.

translation.en: All right.
Well, how sick is she?
She came in complaining of chills and a headache.
translation.it: È arrivata con brividi e mal di testa.

translation.en: Within an hour, she had a 101-degree temperature.
translation.it: Un'ora dopo aveva la febbre a 38.

translation.en: -What could it be? -The doctor's checking her now.
translation.it: Cosa può essere? La stanno visitando.

translation.en: -We'll call you when we know more. -It's okay. I'm coming over there.
translation.it: - La terremo aggiornata. - No, vengo io.

translation.en: They died in a car accident.
translation.it: Sono morti in un incidente d'auto.

translation.en: It says Chase's father just lost control.
translation.it: Il padre di Chase perse il controllo.

translation.en: His real name was Pope.
Chase Goodwin Pope. Born July 14th, 1988.
translation.it: Chase Goodwin Pope. Nato il 14 luglio del 1988.

translation.en: The Collins adopted him after his mother died...
translation.it: L'hanno adottato dopo la morte della madre...

translation.en: ...when he was 2 years old.
-When did you say his birthday was? -July 14th.
translation.it: - Quando hai detto che è nato? - Il 14 luglio.

translation.en: That's the same day his adoptive parents died.
translation.it: Quando sono morti i genitori adottivi.

translation.en: -What year was he born? -1988.
They died on his 18th birthday.
translation.it: Sono morti per il suo 18° compleanno.

translation.en: Why are you taking her to the hospital at Gloucester?
Her temperature's jumped to 105...
...and she's showing symptoms of anaphylactic shock.
translation.it: ...e mostra i sintomi di uno shock anafilattico.

translation.en: -What does that mean? -It's a severe allergic reaction.
translation.it: - Che significa? - È una grave reazione allergica.

translation.en: -To what? -We're not sure.
It's as if she'd been bitten by hundreds of insects.
Like spiders.
-That's where I've heard it before. -What are you talking about?
translation.it: - Ecco dove l'ho sentito prima. - Cosa?

translation.en: The Book of Damnation. They used to call her Goody Pope.
translation.it: Il Libro della Dannazione . La comare Pope.

translation.en: Do you remember her?
I haven't read the Book since we were kids.
translation.it: Non leggo il libro da quando ero piccolo.

translation.en: Just call Reid and Tyler.
I told them everything.
About the darkling, what we found in his file....
It's a list of names...
translation.it: Questa è una lista dei nomi...

translation.en: ...who brought charges against John Putnam and his family...
translation.it: di chi accusò John Putnam e la sua famiglia nella caccia di Salem.

translation.en: ...during the Salem hunt. Pope was one of them.
translation.it: di chi accusò John Putnam e la sua famiglia nella caccia di Salem. La Pope era tra quelli.

translation.en: Goody Pope.
Widow of Jacob, mother to Hagen.
translation.it: Vedova di Jacob, madre di Hagen.

translation.en: So what?
So she claims that John Putnam came to her as an incubus in her dreams...
translation.it: Accusò John Putman di essersi accoppiato con lei in sogno...

translation.en: ...after she was widowed.
The Book also records births and deaths during the damnation.
translation.it: Il Libro elenca anche nascite e morti durante la dannazione.

translation.en: Goody Pope's husband, Jacob, died June 4th, 1692.
translation.it: Il marito della Pope, Jacob, morì il 4 giugno del 1692.

translation.en: Her son, Hagen, was born April 11th, 1693.
translation.it: Il figlio, Hagen, nacque l'11 aprile del 1693.

translation.en: That's 10 months and 24 days later.
If what you're saying is true...
...and Hagen Pope is the bastard son of John Putnam...
translation.it: ...e Hagen Pope è il figlio bastardo di John Putnam...

translation.en: ...then the fifth bloodline in the Covenant didn't end in Salem.
translation.it: ...la quinta stirpe del Patto non finì a Salem.

translation.en: -And Chase is one of us. -That's crazy.
translation.it: - E Chase è uno di noi. - È assurdo.

translation.en: He can't be.
The night after the party at the Dells...
translation.it: La notte dopo la festa ai Dells...

translation.en: ...someone was using.
The Power was strong enough to wake me.
translation.it: Il Potere era così forte da svegliarmi.

translation.en: The next night, it happened again.
translation.it: Il Potere era così forte da svegliarmi. La sera dopo, di nuovo.

translation.en: -I felt it then. -See? I told you.
translation.it: - L'ho sentito. - Visto? Te l'avevo detto.

translation.en: I felt it too.
When you said it wasn't you, were you lying?
translation.it: Quando hai detto che non eri tu, mentivi?

translation.en: -You swear? -I swear.
Then it was him.
-Hey, could I call you--? -Caleb, Kate's been attacked.
translation.it: - Ehi, posso richiamarti...? - Caleb, Kate è stata aggredita.

translation.en: Wait, wait. What?
They say it's like she's been bitten by spiders...
translation.it: Dicono che sembrano morsi di ragni...

translation.en: ...and I had this terrible nightmare about spiders.
translation.it: ...e io ho fatto un incubo sui ragni.

translation.en: I'm scared, Caleb. Something weird is happening.
translation.it: Ho paura, Caleb. Sta accadendo qualcosa di strano.

translation.en: Okay, listen. I want you to go back to your dorm...
translation.it: Va bene, ascolta. Devi tornare in dormitorio...

translation.en: ...and wait for me there.
-I'll see you soon, okay? -Okay.
He's put a spell on Kate.
translation.it: Ha fatto un incantesimo a Kate.

translation.en: What are you talking about? What kind of spell?
Creation.
Spiders.
They're taking her to a hospital in Gloucester.
Don't do anything until we know what he wants.
translation.it: No! Dobbiamo sapere cosa vuole. Si tratta di Kate!

translation.en: We're talking about Kate!
Come to save Little Miss Muffet, have we?
translation.it: Sei venuto a salvare la damigella in pericolo?

translation.en: Well, you're too late.
A spider came and sat down beside her...
translation.it: Il ragno cattivo è arrivato prima...

translation.en: ...and frightened Miss Muffet away.
You hurt Kate, and I'll kill you.
translation.it: Se fai del male a Kate, ti uccido.

translation.en: Hurt her?
I only used her to get to you.
translation.it: L'ho usata per arrivare a te.

translation.en: It's you that I'm gonna hurt.
translation.it: È a te che farò del male.

translation.en: And you're just my bait to get to Caleb.
translation.it: E tu sei solo l'esca per arrivare a Caleb.

translation.en: These are her things.
Why don't you go back to the dorm and get some sleep?
translation.it: Perché non torni in dormitorio a riposare un po'?

translation.en: If I hear anything, I'll call you.
translation.it: Se ci sono novità, ti chiamo.

translation.en: Hey.
What's wrong?
Have you seen Pogue?
No, but I called him and told him about Kate.
translation.it: No, ma l'ho chiamato per dirgli di Kate.

translation.en: Well, how is she?
Not so good. But they said they'd call if there are any changes.
translation.it: Non bene. Ma mi chiamano se ci sono novità.

translation.en: Maybe this is him.
Pogue's been in an accident.
Stop right there.
Close the door.
Let's just keep this between the Sons of Ipswich.
translation.it: Che rimanga tra noi Figli di Ipswich.

translation.en: Don't hurt her. She has nothing to do with this.
translation.it: Non farle del male. Lei non c'entra niente.

translation.en: Whether she lives or dies is entirely up to you, my friend.
translation.it: Se vivrà o morirà dipende solo da te, amico mio.

translation.en: You can't imagine what it was like growing up not knowing what this was.
translation.it: Non puoi capire che significa crescere senza sapere che succede.

translation.en: When I finally found my real father, he filled in all the missing pieces.
translation.it: Quando finalmente trovai il mio vero padre, mise insieme tutti i pezzi.

translation.en: But it was too late. I was hooked.
translation.it: Ma era troppo tardi. Ero dipendente.

translation.en: By then, he was such a bitter old man--
translation.it: E lui ormai era diventato un vecchio scorbutico...

translation.en: Or I should say, bitter, old, young man.
translation.it: O meglio... un giovane vecchio scorbutico.

translation.en: --that all he wanted to do was end the suffering.
translation.it: ...al punto che voleva solo farla finita.

translation.en: Like all our bloodline before us...
...he was more than willing to break the laws...
translation.it: ...era ben disposto a infrangere le leggi...

translation.en: ...of your sacred little club.
So I got him to give me his share of The Power.
translation.it: Lo convinsi a darmi il suo Potere.

translation.en: And he died knowing that his son was going to get revenge...
translation.it: E morì sapendo che suo figlio si sarebbe vendicato...

translation.en: ...on your Covenant.
You keep her in that spell, and she'll die.
translation.it: ...di voi del Patto. Se continui, rischia di morire.

translation.en: I know.
What is this all about? I mean, what do you want?
translation.it: Perché tutto questo? Insomma, cosa vuoi?

translation.en: Want?
I'm Chase Collins.
I have everything I could possibly want.
translation.it: Ho tutto quello che potrei mai desiderare.

translation.en: It's what I need.
More power.
Tomorrow night, birthday boy...
translation.it: Domani sera, caro il mio festeggiato...

translation.en: ...at the exact moment when you ascend...
...be at Putnam Barn...
...where you will will me your power.
Do that, and I'll let her live.
translation.it: Se lo fai, la lascerò vivere.

translation.en: And Pogue, Kate, Reid and Tyler and your mom...
translation.it: Lei insieme a Pogue, Kate, Reid, Tyler, tua madre...

translation.en: ...and what's left of the families.
translation.it: ...e tutto ciò che resta delle famiglie.

translation.en: And don't think I won't kill them.
translation.it: E non credere che non li ucciderò.

translation.en: It comes natural to me.
Just ask my adoptive parents.
You killed that kid at the Dells.
translation.it: Hai ucciso tu quel ragazzo ai Dells.

translation.en: Well, he caught me doing a little magic.
translation.it: Beh, mi ha beccato mentre facevo delle magie.

translation.en: At first, he wasn't sure, but then, well...
translation.it: All'inizio, non ne era certo, ma poi...

translation.en: ...he just wouldn't leave it alone.
So I caught a ride with him over to the bonfire.
translation.it: Così ho fatto in modo che quella fosse la sua ultima sera.

translation.en: What are you doing?
Just making sure I'm making my point.
translation.it: Mi assicuro che tu capisca davvero.

translation.en: Do you see my problem here?
I like to use. A lot.
Only...
...no one ever told me about...
...the effects and the damage.
The addiction.
And we both know what happens, now, don't we?
translation.it: E sappiamo entrambi che effetti ha, no?

translation.en: So...
...the way I see it...
...I add your power to what I already have.
translation.it: ...aggiungere il tuo potere a quello che ho.

translation.en: It won't stop the aging.
Your father obviously found out the hard way.
translation.it: Tuo padre l'ha scoperto a sue spese.

translation.en: My father never had this kind of power.
translation.it: Mio padre non ha mai avuto questo potere.

translation.en: It doesn't work like that.
It's the body that wears down, not the power.
translation.it: È il corpo che si consuma, non il potere.

translation.en: Just think of yourself as a sacrificial lamb.
translation.it: Pensa a te stesso come a un agnello sacrificale.

translation.en: Hell...
...you're already their golden boy.
Why not go out a real hero?
So tomorrow night, the barn.
Where it all started.
A birthday party. Just you and me.
translation.it: Una festa di compleanno. Solo io e te.

translation.en: It's either you...
...or them...
...brother.
Don't leave her like that. She'll die.
What happened?
-You passed out when I told you-- -What?
translation.it: - Sei svenuta quando ti ho detto... - Cosa?

translation.en: -Pogue's been in an accident. -Is he okay?
translation.it: - Pogue ha avuto un incidente. - Sta bene?

translation.en: Hey, hey, take it easy.
-What? -Stay away.
He's more powerful...
...than you can imagine.
Hey, don't worry. Don't worry about that.
translation.it: Ehi, non preoccuparti. Non ci pensare.

translation.en: We can't stop him.
-How is he? -He's hurt pretty bad.
-Where's Sarah? -Waiting room.
I say we all go after Chase. Right now.
translation.it: Io dico di cercare Chase. Subito.

translation.en: Listen, it may not be that easy.
You guys stay here with Pogue. Call me if there's a change.
translation.it: Voi restate con Pogue. Chiamatemi se ci sono novità.

translation.en: How's Pogue?
He's not good.
What about Kate? Have you heard anything?
They stabilized her, but she's still really sick.
translation.it: L'hanno stabilizzata, ma è molto grave.

translation.en: Caleb, look me in the eye and tell me the truth.
translation.it: Caleb! Guardami negli occhi e dimmi la verità.

translation.en: The spiders.
I read about them. They're one of the charges against John Putnam.
translation.it: Ho letto che erano tra le accuse mosse a John Putnam.

translation.en: They're some kind of spell, aren't they?
translation.it: È un qualche incantesimo, non è vero?

translation.en: I wanna show you something...
...and then I'll explain everything.
Don't be afraid.
What about your caretaker?
It'll be okay.
-What are you doing? -It's all right.
translation.it: - Che stai facendo? - È tutto a posto.

translation.en: -Caleb.... -This is important to me, Gorman.
translation.it: Caleb.... È importante per me, Gorman.

translation.en: It's okay.
This is William Danvers III, my father.
translation.it: Questo è William Danvers III, mio padre.

translation.en: He's 44 years old.
Every generation, the bloodlines produce only one:
translation.it: Ogni stirpe ne produce uno solo per generazione:

translation.en: The eldest male.
And you've always had this power?
translation.it: E hai sempre avuto questo potere?

translation.en: At 13, you get a taste of it. It's a test, in a way.
translation.it: A 13 anni ne hai un assaggio. Serve un po' da test.

translation.en: At 18, we ascend, and our powers fully mature...
translation.it: A 18 anni, ascendiamo, e i nostri poteri maturano pienamente...

translation.en: ...and it's seductive.
And some can handle it, and others, like my father, couldn't.
translation.it: Alcuni riescono a gestirlo, mentre altri, come mio padre, no.

translation.en: Tonight, at 12 minutes past 11, I'll ascend.
And what if you don't will him your share?
translation.it: E se non gli cedi la tua parte?

translation.en: He's already got his father's. It makes him very powerful.
translation.it: Ha già quella del padre. Lo ha reso potentissimo.

translation.en: And what if someone wills you their share?
translation.it: E se qualcuno cede a te la sua?

translation.en: It's against the Covenant laws. If it weren't, I wouldn't let them.
translation.it: È contro le leggi del Patto. Ma non vorrei comunque.

translation.en: -Why not? -When one ascends...
...The Power becomes your life.
That's why it ages you.
Will it away, and you die.
Caleb, you cannot do this alone. We have to go to the others.
translation.it: Caleb, non puoi farlo da solo. Dobbiamo dirlo agli altri.

translation.en: We can't do that. He'll kill us all, including you.
translation.it: Non possiamo. Ci ucciderà tutti, anche te.

translation.en: Pogue was the final warning.
-We have to go to your father. -No.
I know what you're thinking, Mother, and you know what'll happen.
translation.it: So che hai in mente, e sai cosa succederebbe.

translation.en: But he loves you.
Well, then, he'll die with that secret.
translation.it: Allora porterà quel segreto nella tomba.

translation.en: -Where's Sarah? -Upstairs, changing.
translation.it: - Dov'è Sarah? - Di sopra a cambiarsi.

translation.en: -You should never have involved her. -You're right.
But I can't change the past...
translation.it: Ma non posso cambiare il passato...

translation.en: ...and he's using her against me, all of you...
translation.it: ...e ora usa lei, e tutti voi, contro di me...

translation.en: ...and it's going to stop.
I want you to take Sarah to the dance.
I'll meet you there. I don't think he'll try anything in the open.
translation.it: Ci vediamo lì. Non credo farà nulla in pubblico.

translation.en: Would you just let us help you? You know we've got your back.
translation.it: Perché non possiamo aiutarti? Ti guardiamo le spalle.

translation.en: I know you do.
But please, just once, do what I ask.
translation.it: Ma vi prego, per una volta, fate come dico.

translation.en: You look beautiful, my dear.
-Ready? -Yeah.
Why can't I go with you?
-I won't risk you. -I'm scared.
translation.it: - Non ti metterò a rischio. - Ho paura.

translation.en: Don't be.
-I'll see you soon. -You better.
I promise.
Be careful. I'll call you.
-Hey, any sign of him? -No.
Good. Listen, I'm on my way. If he does show...
translation.it: Bene. Ascolta, sono per strada. Se si fa vivo...

translation.en: ...please promise me you won't do anything stupid.
-How's Sarah doing? Can I talk to her? -Yeah, she's fine. Hang on.
translation.it: - Come sta Sarah? Me la passi? - Sì, sta bene. Aspetta.

translation.en: -She was just here. -Guys, what's going on?
translation.it: - Era qui un attimo fa. - Ragazzi, che succede?

translation.en: What's your plan? You can't beat me, you know.
translation.it: Che hai in mente? Non puoi battermi, lo sai.

translation.en: Something's happened.
You know...
...I'm just getting the feeling that...
...you're not gonna keep up your end of the bargain...
...so I took out a little insurance policy.
translation.it: ...perciò mi sono fatto una polizza assicurativa.

translation.en: She does look quite stunning.
You touch her, and she dies.
In fact, time's running out for Sarah.
translation.it: In effetti, Sarah non ha molto tempo.

translation.en: So why don't we get down to business?
Witchy.
Oops, wait.
Did I just say, "witch"?
All right. Tell you what. I'll make this easy for you.
translation.it: D'accordo. Facciamo così. Ti rendo le cose più semplici.

translation.en: How about an accident?
translation.it: Che ne dici di un incidente?

translation.en: You lose control of your car on the way to the pathetic little dance.
translation.it: Perdi il controllo dell'auto mentre vai a quella patetica festicciola.

translation.en: Trust me. I'm good at car accidents.
translation.it: Fidati. Gli incidenti d'auto sono la mia specialità.

translation.en: Everyone'll miss you.
They'll say great things about you.
translation.it: Diranno tante belle cose di te.

translation.en: Only the Covenant will know the real truth.
But, to them, you'll become a legend.
The one who gave his life for them.
translation.it: L'eroe che si è sacrificato per loro.

translation.en: How about you let her go, and I let you live out your life?
translation.it: Se la lasci andare, io lascerò andare te.

translation.en: How about I make you my "weyotch"?
I'll never will you my power.
Then it looks like trouble for Sarah.
translation.it: Allora per Sarah si mette male.

translation.en: I'll never let that happen.
Fine. Let's do it your way.
translation.it: Va bene. Facciamo come dici tu.

translation.en: Like taking candy from a baby.
translation.it: Come rubare le caramelle a un bambino.

translation.en: Easy as pie.
-You find her? -No.
Twelve minutes past 11.
Happy birthday, Caleb.
Are we ascending?
Finally!
Scary, huh, Caleb...
...this new power you get when you ascend?
translation.it: ...il nuovo potere che ottieni quando ascendi?

translation.en: Frankly, I don't think you're cut out for it.
translation.it: Sinceramente, secondo me non fa per te.

translation.en: So why don't we just call it a night?
Just say the words.
Okay, I'm a little impressed.
-Not bad. -Thanks.
Trying to impress your date, huh?
translation.it: Vuoi far colpo sulla tua ragazza?

translation.en: You ready to say uncle?
I'm ready for you to go to hell.
Leave us, Gorman.
Just say the words.
Say the words, and it's all over.
Listen to me, William.
I need you to understand me.
translation.it: Ho bisogno che tu mi capisca.

translation.en: Come on! Say it! Say the words!
...will you...
...nothing.
He is your son.
For once in your life, think of someone other than yourself.
translation.it: Per una volta nella tua vita, non pensare solo a te stesso.

translation.en: ...will...
...my power.
We searched the entire area. We didn't find anybody.
translation.it: Abbiamo cercato ovunque. Non c'è nessuno.

translation.en: How can that be?
Where is he?
I don't know.
